Product Description

How to connect the Bluetooth smartwatch to make or answer calls on the watch?

You need to download the APP from your phone’s APP store, turn on your bluetooth and open the APP, click “Add A Device” , then find “P42B” to pair it.

Android: After successfully connecting the APP, the mobile phone will automatically pop up “Pair”or”OK” in 5 seconds to request a Bluetooth call. It does not need to be set on the mobile phone separately. After the binding is successful, you can answer and make calls on the watch.

iPhone: After the APP is successfully bound, you need to open the Phone settings → Bluetooth on the phone, find Bluetooth named “P42B_Phone” in the list, and click “Pair”. After the binding is successful, you can answer and make calls on the watch.

Wwzzey smart watch is a best choice as an exquisite gift for Birthday, Christmas, Wedding Anniversary, Valentine’s day, Father’s Day, Mother’s Day, Thanksgiving Day and other special days etc.

Main Functions: Make/Answer calls, Pedometer, Heart rate Monitor, Spo2 Monitor, Sleep Monitor, Workout modes; Alarm Clock; Wake Up Gesture; Remote Camera; 150+ Watch Faces; Time Format; Information Sync; Reminders; Find Device; Sports; Weather; Music Control & Player; AI Voice; Breathe; Exercise; Game; Flashlight, ect.

Stylish Smart Watch for Women and Men

Package:

1 x IP68 Waterproof Bluetooth Smart

1 x Charging Cable

1 x User Manual

1 x Screen Protector

Wwzzey 1.7” Touch Screen Buletooth Smart Watch

Multi-function Smartwatch Fitness Watch for Android/iOS Phone:

Screen: 1.7 inch HD Full touch screen

Dimension: L*W*H=43.5*36*11.0mm

Wristband Materials: Silicone + Stainless Steel

Wristband size: The band size is 20mm width;

Total length 255MM, adjustable length 155-235MM

Bluetooth version: Bluetooth 4.0

Don’t missing any notifications

After connecting the watch with your phone, you can get calls, receive SMS and APP messages (Text, Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, Twitter…), calendar, weather and other smartphone app alerts, and you won’t miss any important information.

Ai Voice

Connect the mobile phone Bluetooth, you can voice control the mobile phone to reply to the message, check the weather, etc.

The AI voice function making it possible to complete tasks without having to grab your phone out of your pocket book.

Camera Remotely

Just open the App on your smart phone and find the shake camera function to take a photo by shaking your smart watch, making it easier to record your happy moments with your friends and family.

Excellent Daily Partner

This fitness tracker watch not only can accurately provide 24/7 Heart Rate monitoring, calories burned counter, steps counter, sleep monitoring, but also many practical features, such as alarm clocks, weather forecast, music control, stopwatch, timer, deep breath guide, sedentary reminder, helping you have a healthier lifestyle. And it’s a good choice as gift for your friends and family.

A Variety of Sport Modes

Our fitness tracker has 8 sport modes： Basketball, football, swimming, cycling, walking, running, skipping rope, badminton. It can meet your daily exercise needs basically.

Long Battery Life

iOS Android smart watch is equipped with a 235mAh battery, just need to be charged for 1.5 to 2 hours, can be used for 2-3 days bluetooth call. And it Supports 20 days standby time.

【2022 Fashionable Bluetooth Call Smart Watch】Wwzzey smart watch allows you to answer or dial calls anywhere, anytime. Our bluetooth smartwatch come with fashionable appearance and comfortable silicone bracelet, fit your wrist well and more nicer and safety , easy to wear and take off, and you can adjust the length of the band. It is a ideal choice as a gift for men and womenin 2022.
【1.7 inch Full Touch Screen & Customize Personalized Dial】High texture metal watch frame with 1.7-inch HD full touch screen and excellent image quality design brings you a better user experience. And our smartwatch has more than 150+ different watch faces, you can choose different dials from APP’s market according to festival, your mood or clothes. And you can also customize your watch faces with your personal photos, new look for everyday.
【Push Real-time Information to Your Wrist】The smart watch with bluetooth call can connect to iOS8.0 and Android4.4 phone via Bluetooth 4.0, and you can answer or dial calls anywhere, and get calendar, weather and SNS (Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, and Twitter,etc.) notifications on display. It will be very practical when you are unconvenient to take your phone out or you don’t want to miss anything important.
【Multifunctional Health Tracking】This fitness watch can measure your steps, walking distance and burning calories precisely in real time, and can monitor your Heart Rate, Blood Oxygen (SpO2) and your sleep, and help you better understand your health and create a health plan. Moreover, the watch not only has alarm/breathing training/sedentary reminder/drinking water reminder and other functions, but also can control music, control a camera remotely to record your happy moments with friends more easily.
【IP68 Waterproof & 8 Sports Models】Our health tracker is completely dust-proof and waterproof, you can wear it in washing hands, walking in the rain, bathing or swimming and so on, it can meet your daily needs completely. And the fitness tracker also has 8 sport modes : Basketball, football, swimming, cycling, walking, running, skipping rope, badminton. Pick it to track your real-time data during daily fitness and make exercise easier.
【100% SATISFACTION OF AFTER-SELL SERVICE】You can easily learn how to use it by following our user instructions. Wwzzey offers 7×24 hours customer service and 12 moths after-sales service, support for replacement, and refund. Pls feel free to contact us if you have any issues. As a professional seller on Amazon, we are confident that we will not disappoint you.

Wwzzey is a professional brand for smartwatch. Bring trustworthy sports and health data to every customer and make everyone healthier!

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer No
Date First Available June 30, 2017
Manufacturer Panasonic
Country of Origin Malaysia

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here. [PDF ]

Price: $180.71
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:17:56 UTC – Details)


The Panasonic Cordless Phone KX-TGF575S, with DECT 6.0 and Link2 Cell technology, answering system, dual keypad and 5 cordless phones handsets, allows you to link up to two cell or smart phones and integrate them into the telephone system via Bluetooth, no landline phone line required. All of your contacts stored into your cell or smart phone can be shared with this phone system allowing you access to important contacts right from the handset. Hear who’s calling from across the room without having to get up with text-to-speech announcements in English and Spanish from the base unit and cordless handsets in the home/home office. The Panasonic home phone with answering machine also features easy call block, speakerphone, voice paging, power back up operation and advanced TAD (telephone answering device) functions tie it all together making this system one of the most reliable and functional systems available in the market today. Do not overload power outlets and extension cords. This can result in the risk of fire or electric shock.
Expandable Panasonic Cordless Phone with Answering Machine: 5-handset home phone system with added features to keep you connected; Digital Answering Machine stores 18-min of messages
Interference-Free, Secure Phone Signal: DECT 6.0 wireless technology for whole home coverage and less interference from other electronics; ideal for homes and apartments with thick walls
Bluetooth Phone Connects to Cell and Voice Assistants: Make and receive calls from your cellular device with Link2Cell pairing up to 2 cell phones; connect handsets to Siri, Google Now and S Voice through Voice Assist feature
Bi-Lingual Talking Caller ID and Smart Call Blocker: Talking caller ID announces caller information in English or Spanish; block unwanted calls with the push of a button on telephone handset or main base unit
More Features to Enjoy: Handset to handset intercom and baby monitor function, battery back-up for up to 12-hr talk time when the power goes out, 3000-entry phone book, and more

Advanced Calling Made Easy

Improved five-handset system syncs two smartphones, connects to Siri, Google Now, and S Voice, blocks unwanted callers, includes Talking Caller ID, and a headset jack. Expandable up to six handsets.

Read more

Sync Two Smartphones

The simple push of a button links up to two smartphones to make and receive cell calls routed through your Link2Cell handsets. Advanced Class 1 Bluetooth extends calling range to 330 ft. to easily handle calling from both cell lines simultaneously.

Connect to Siri, Google Now and S Voice

When synced to your smartphone via Link2Cell, you can connect to Siri, Google Now, and S Voice anytime from your handsets with the Voice Assist feature. Simply press ‘Assist’ on the handset or base unit to send voice commands for making phone calls, checking new messages, weather and more, and hear the responses on the handset.

Block Bothersome Callers

With a dedicated Call Block button on each handset, it’s easy to block telemarketers, robocallers, and other unwanted caller numbers. One button registers up to 250 caller numbers — even while the phone is ringing or while you’re talking or listening.

Talking Caller ID

When the phone rings on one side of the room and you’re on the other, Panasonic’s advanced Talking Caller ID in English and Spanish and Text ID tell you who’s calling with text-to-speech announcements from speakers in the base unit and handsets.

Read more

Beyond Intercom

Wake kids for school in the morning and let everyone know when dinner is ready in the evening with Panasonic ‘s exclusive Voice Paging. More than a traditional intercom, VP makes it easy to send clear, simultaneous announcements to every handset in the house, even when family members don’t respond.

Power When the Power Goes Out with Low Battery Alert

Included rechargeable backup batteries keep you connected when the power goes out. With a fully charged handset in the base unit, you’ll have power for up to 12 hours talk time and 7 days standby for calls using other cordless handsets in the house.

Now, when any of your handsets are running low on power, the handsets alert you. And as an added convenience, a large, highly-visible battery status icon on the handset LCD lets you know as well.

Hear Calls from Noisy Places

Whether someone’s calling from a busy city street or a raucous room, Noise Reduction automatically suppresses background interference while also enhancing voice tones for clearer, more comfortable conversations.

Large Backlit Display

A large 1.8-inch high-contrast white backlit LCD and enlarged, easier to see and use dial keys and function control buttons make home and home office call management quicker and more convenient for everyone.

Read more

Additional Calling Conveniences

With the Panasonic KX-TGF575S system, you can program and store up to 3,000 numbers in your phonebook, and enjoy the time-saving convenience of nine speed dial settings and handset-to-handset intercom.

App Alert (for Android) :

Download the Panasonic Link2Cell app to stay informed and up to date via your smartphone, tablet and Link2Cell system. Receive SMS, email, calendar, low battery notice, Facebook, Twitter and Instagram notifications on your Link2Cell base unit and LCD handsets.

Accessories :

The KX-TGF575S base unit is wall-mountable and comes with matching wall bracket and screws. Two rechargeable AAA-size Ni-MH batteries plus a belt clip are also included.

What’s in the Box :

  • KX-TGF575S phone system base unit
  • 5 Cordless handsets
  • 4 Chargers
  • 5 Belt clips
  • Wall mount
  • 10 Rechargeable Ni-MH AAA-size batteries

Read more

Product Description

UHD 4K Mirror TV- 32″

What’s Mirror TV

A mirror TV is a TV which front panel is optical mirror. The TV picture vanishes when turned off, returning to a full mirror.

Using a mirror TV doesn’t only enhance the overall look of your bathroom. In addition, it also entertains you, resulting in making your life a lot better. Nothing beats sitting in a bathtub watching TV after a long and hectic day. It gives you time to relax your mind as well as relieve yourself of those pesky muscles that are tired from carrying the burden all day.

Smart Remote Control

The Magic Remote acts as a universal remote. And you can use voice commands, air mouse control and click wheel to manage your entertainment and apps.You can simply click, point, scroll or use voice commands to change the channel, search for something new, and more. Spend less time navigating confusing menus and juggling multiple remotes, and more time enjoying your entertainment.You just need to shake the Magic Remote left and right to turn on the pointer, and press the up, down, left or right buttons to turn it off.Through the remote app, you can also control your Smart TV with your phone or tablet.

Who Will Reject Such Beautiful Gift?

Soulaca provides coloring packing, unlike the previous neutral packaging, this is for new house decoration gifts, congratulations gifts, birthday gifts, suitable using in any festival. It’s a precious gift to a precious person.

Certified Electric Leakage Switch Protection

Besides the waterproof treated motherboard, Speakers and enclosures, the power cord is also with electric leakage protection system.

Mirror TV Turned Off

Magic Remote Control

Color Box Packaging

Safety Switch

Specifications

Connectivity Technology Ethernet RJ45, Optical Audio Out, Earphone Audio Out, AV, USB2.0 x 2, HDMI2.0 x 3 (ARC x 1), TV Tuner, Bluetooth5.0, Dual Band WiFi (2.4G & 5G) Operating System LG webOS (4K UHD Version) RAM 1.5G Flash Storage 8G Streaming Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+, Hulu, Apple TV+, YouTube etc. Special Features Waterproof, Mirror Panel, AI Voice Control, Magic Remote, Pointer, ThinQ and Built-in Alexa TV Power Input AC 110-230V Dust-proof / Waterproof Rating IP65 Power Consumption Operating: 23W, Standby: <0.5W Built-in Speakers Built-in 8Ω /10W x 2 Working Temperature 0℃ – 40℃ (32°F – 104°F) Remote Control Supplied Magic Remote (With Waterproof Cover Supplied); IR, BT, Voice Control, Hotkeys, Universal Control, Pointer (Zyro Sensor) Voice Recognition: 15 Languages / 143 Countries TV Dimensions 742W x 437H x 49Dmm (29.2”W x 17.2”H x 2”D) Recess in Wall Dimensions 585.5W x 335H x 27D mm (23.1” W x 13.2” H x 1.01” D) Controller Type ARM CA55 1.1GHz Quad Core Packing Includes 32” WebOS mirror TV, Magic Remote, Remote Waterproof Silica Gel Cover, Remote Holder, TV Bracket, Screw Set, Manuals (English, Spanish), Power Cord (With Leakage Breaker)

Applications

Kitchen Mirror TV

In front of the Bathtub

Artwork Display

Awesome WebOS System

Soulaca Smart TVs with webOS deliver what you want including news, sports, entertainment and more. It’s all at your fingertips.You will access a whole new world of entertainment with the webOS apps. Outstanding content from Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Hulu, YouTube, VUDU and much more.

Connections

Internet RJ45Optical Digital Audio OutEarphone Audio OutAV (AV In, AV L In, AV R In)USB2.0 x 2HDMI x 3 (ARC x 1)TV Tuner (ATV(NTSC)/ATSC)BluetoothWiFi (Dual Band 2.4G/5G)

Super Thin Design

Soulaca webOS TV 2022 new model is with slimmer profiles which creates a more elegant visual effect that’s easier to integrate into the room’s overall design. The two built-in speakers are placed back side behind the display screen so that no sound holes can be seen from the front mirror.

2 in 1 Function Bracket

Option 1: In-wall with the Mounting Bracket

1. Create an opening within the chosen area of the wall according to the mounting bracket outlines. Leave enough space for the cables and adapter.

2. Set up power and signal circuit and the outlet.

3. Place the mounting bracket into the recess and use the pilot holes to drill into the wall on sides or back.

4. Place the raw plugs into the holes that have been drilled and screw the mounting bracket into position.

5. Organize the cables and offer the TV up to the mounting bracket that is fixed within the wall.

6. Line up the 4 x pilot holes located on the back of the TV case with the 4 x metal lugs located on the mounting bracket and simply push the TV into suit.

Option 2: On-wall with the Mounting Bracket

1. Drill holes within the chosen area of the wall according to the mounting bracket outlines.

2. Place the raw plugs into the holes and screw the mounting bracket into position so it is attached to the wall.

3. Set up power and signal circuit and the outlet.

4. Simply offer the TV up to the mounting bracket that is fixed on the wall.

5. Line up the 4 x pilot holes located on the back of the TV case with the 4 x metal lugs located on the mounting bracket and simply push the TV into suit.

Option 3: On-desk with Base Stand Bracket

Package enclose an Alexa Voice Control Magic Remote: Press and ask Alexa on the Smart Magic Remote, to control your TV and connected devices with built-in Alexa or ThinQ AI. With the built-in Alexa, you can easily find, launch, and control the contents. You can even ask Alexa to check the weather, update you on sports scores, or tell you a joke.
【INTERFACE】 – TV/HDMI x 3/USB x 2/Audio Out Port/ LAN/Integrated Wi-Fi&Bluetooth. The Magic Remote acts as a universal remote. And you can use voice commands, air mouse control and click wheel to manage your entertainment and apps.

【SHIPPING&WARRANTY】- It usually takes 2-4 working days for us to ship out the product via DHL, FedEx or UPS after the payment is made and confirmed, then an additional 3-7 working days to reach you. All our TVs come with 2 years warranty. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact Soulaca customer service, we will come back to you within 24 hours!

2. Set up power and signal circuit and the outlet.

3. Place the mounting bracket into the recess and use the pilot holes to drill into the wall on sides or back.

4. Place the raw plugs into the holes that have been drilled and screw the mounting bracket into position.

5. Organize the cables and offer the TV up to the mounting bracket that is fixed within the wall.

6. Line up the 4 x pilot holes located on the back of the TV case with the 4 x metal lugs located on the mounting bracket and simply push the TV into suit.

Option 2: On-wall with the Mounting Bracket

1. Drill holes within the chosen area of the wall according to the mounting bracket outlines.

2. Place the raw plugs into the holes and screw the mounting bracket into position so it is attached to the wall.

3. Set up power and signal circuit and the outlet.

4. Simply offer the TV up to the mounting bracket that is fixed on the wall.

5. Line up the 4 x pilot holes located on the back of the TV case with the 4 x metal lugs located on the mounting bracket and simply push the TV into suit.

Option 3: On-desk with Base Stand Bracket

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $119.99 - $83.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 00:42:59 UTC – Details)


Enjoy the clarity and reliability of a landline phone, with easy-to-use features that make your work and home life easier. Panasonic Cordless Phone KX-TGD664M is a 4-handset home phone system expandable up to 6 handsets, with an integrated Digital Answering machine to make sure you never miss a message. Make even your cell calls more clear by using Link2Cell to connect your mobile phone to your landline, giving landline-level call clarity to every cell call that comes through. And no need to worry about draining the battery — an audible Low Battery Alert lets you know when the battery needs charging, and more. Noise Reduction Technology helps make every call as clear as possible by reducing the surrounding noise coming from the other party’s telephone. A robust Call Block system allows 1-step blocking up to 150 nuisance callers with the touch of a button, while a Phone book of up to 3,000 numbers makes sure all your important contacts easily accessible. A range of hands-free phone functions lets you enjoy mobility and flexibility–full duplex speakerphone lets you use your handset hands-free; handset can be used as a baby monitor even while away from home. Bilingual Caller ID lets you customize your caller ID to display in English or Spanish and get caller announcements in that same language so you can hear who is calling, even when you’re across the room (note: caller ID requires additional service through your local phone company).
Cordless Telephone with Digital Answering Machine: Phone system (expandable up to 6 handsets) stores up to 18 minutes of messages; Quick-read Message Counter lets you check for messages easily; retrieve from base unit or a from a handset
Connect to your Mobile Phone: Make and receive clear cell phone calls even in cell dead zones; Pair up to 2 cell phones via Bluetooth with the base unit for increased call clarity and reliability
Easily Block Unwanted Callers: Block up to 150 nuisance callers using the one-touch Call Block button
Hear More Clearly: Noise Reduction lets you hear the voice of the person you are talking to more clearly by reducing the surrounding noise coming from the other party’s telephone
Voice Functions and Baby Monitor: Full duplex speakerphone lets you use your handset hands-free and use voice commands; handset can easily monitor different areas of the house (such as a baby’s room) even while away from home

Panasonic KX-TGD664M

4 Handset Cordless Phone System with Link2Cell

Make working from home easier and stress-free with the smart, easy-to-use KX-TGD664M cordless phone system. Connect to a cell phone via Bluetooth for landline-level clarity on mobile calls. Robust,1-step Call Block helps you avoid nuisance callers, and many other features provide daily convenience.

Link2Cell Technology

Make and receive cellphone calls

Pair up to 2 cell phones via Bluetooth with the base unit to get increased call clarity and reliability, avoiding cell dead zones in your home. The handsets alert you when your cell phone receives incoming calls and texts and allow you to make and receive mobile phone calls with landline clarity.

Bilingual Taking Caller ID

Caller ID displays in English or Spanish and announces caller information in the language you choose, so you never miss an important call.

Easily Block Unwanted Callers

Say good-bye to scam calls and telemarketers. A one-touch Call Block button lets you easily block nuisance callers. Store up to 150 unwanted caller numbers.

Expand Your System

Keep additional handsets virtually anywhere you need in your home, expanding your phone system up to 6 cordless handsets (sold separately).

Digital Answering System

Records up to 18 minutes of messages, available at a glance from Quick-read Message Counter. Pick up messages from the base unit or cordless handset.

Noise-Free Talking & Listening

Noise reduction technology lets you hear the voice of the person you are talking to more clearly.

Store Important Numbers

Phonebook stores up to 3,000 important numbers. Caller ID displays up to 50 entries.

Speakerphone Doubles as a Baby Monitor

Place a cordless handset unit in baby's room to audibly monitor from different areas of the house or even while away from home! The monitored handset will automatically call the monitoring handset, base unit, or the stored phone number when it detects sound.

Long Battery Life with Low Battery Alert

Enjoy up to 10 hours talk time and 5 days of standby on handsets (while in eco mode). And, you never have to worry about the handset running out of power - audible alerts and visual icons make sure you know when it's time to charge.
